title: Top Watch
description: It is a Full-stack MERN project. Use admin, seller, and buyer-specific dashboards. Where users can buy/sell used Watches. Use MongoDB for store data, Stripe for payment & basic CRUD operation done on the server site
feature: Admin and user has different Dashboard system

title: Mr Tutor
description: This is a Full-stack (MERN) project.Firebase authentication implement in this site. Where users can add any courses. Use MongoDB for store data,CRUD operation done on the server site.User can give review any product
feature: Any authorize user can add course
User can submit any review and also can delete

title: E-Learner
description: This website is about learning site . Users can purchase any type of course from this site.I use the website firebase authentication. Users can access premium access by completing the steps.
feature: This website is about learning site
Any authorize user can purchase course
User can get premium access for any course
